issue.title: Is Urban Circuit submission be done for experiment purpose?

content.raw:
Simple/practice worlds of previous circuits are available to submit against.  As a general rule of thumb, if the world is available in the drop-down menu: it is available to be submitted to and experimented with.  Any limits on CloudSim testing will be communicated through prompts in the submission API.

tl;dr: It is working, go for it!
content.html:
Simple/practice worlds of previous circuits are available to submit against. As a general rule of thumb, if the world is available in the drop-down menu: it is available to be submitted to and experimented with. Any limits on CloudSim testing will be communicated through prompts in the submission API.

tl;dr: It is working, go for it!
